<MethodEndpoint

Delete a group by name.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Group name","in":"path","name":"name","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Delete all workloads in the group (default: false, moves workloads to default group)","in":"query","name":"with-workloads","schema":{"type":"boolean"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
